Klopp on Coutinho: "If he would be fit and not in the squad, then maybe we could talk about it. But he is not fit."

Jurgen Klopp has confirmed Liverpool are still looking to sign a midfielder before the transfer window shuts.

Klopp: "Are we looking still for players? Yes. That is the truth. But we were looking for them before Adam was injured, & Phil is injured."

Klopp: "We will see what happens for us. We’ve tried to strengthen the squad. That’s happened in all parts."

Klopp: "Dom puts pressure on all our other central strikers. Mo too and Robbo is really on a good way so that’s all cool."

Klopp: "Alberto Moreno – you saw him. He looks good, he has matured. When he can really handle them, he is an outstanding player."

Klopp believes he cannot put a price on Philippe Coutinho because it's too late to replace him, by @JamesPearceEcho

Klopp: "You cannot come up, close to the start of the season. The club is bigger than anybody. That is the most important thing."

Klopp: "It’s about doing it in the right moment. It’s how we do it when we want to bring in, it is about timing. That is how I understand."

Klopp: "And that is all I have to say. Maybe everybody has a price – in the right moment. In the wrong moment? No price."
